Funny, in both Vietnamese and Khmer they call Bougainvillea "paper flower." Makes sense though. 

There is no purple pothos. Sounds like you're looking for the purple Tradescantia, used to be called "Purple King." Really easy, bulletproof plant. 

Are these plants for inside, or out on the front? I work at a house plant store and when I told people in Vietnam that, they said, "what's a house plant?" :-) Because with no winter there, there are just plants!
You and Chris shared this lovely video to your fans. I also have a big pot of Monstera in the kitchen. I hope the plants will thrive. 👍👏🇬🇧♥️
